file_content.text: Trial accounts may not use the Cargo Hold. <u><hl lid="BDJKJokAAAEADBDz" ></u>

Use the Cargo Hold to store items for later and free up inventory space! The Cargo Hold initially stores 80 items with additional expansions up to 400 slots.

Subscribers and Preferred Status Players get automatic access to the first 80 Cargo Hold slots. Access and expansions can also be purchased using Cartel Coins.
Use Cartel Coins to immediately acquire 80 Cargo Hold slots!
Access to Legacy Stronghold Storage is restricted, you must purchase a Stronghold to gain access.
